errors.error_description: The example `.pypirc` configuration is missing the required `[pypi]` section header. Without the header, Twine cannot parse the file correctly.
correction_candidates: Add `[pypi]` on a new line before the `username` field.
Use environment variables `TWINE_USERNAME` and `TWINE_PASSWORD` instead of a file.
errors.golden_answer: Add `[pypi]` on a new line before the `username` field.
